name: Snek (TwisterGE)
description:
Snek is a simple arcade game where the main objective is to eat fruit, as many as you can,

while avoiding enemies and rotten fruit

Controls: Left/Right Arrow Keys Control the snekUp/Down Arrow KeysMenu interaction/Scrolling through hi-scoresEnterAccept selected menu optionPPauseSpaceRelease Bomb
Bugs & Features

To report any bug or request any feature, just submit an issue to the GitHub Page.
